segments.text: I'm getting sick of work man . I can't take the political bull in the company any more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you just get your review or something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , but that's not why I am upset . I just found out another guy got a promotion . He doesn't know how to do anything . He sits there and kisses the managers butt all day long .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm just pissed that management can't see behind his smooth talking lies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look on the bright side . At least you have a job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I shouldn't stress about this anymore . It's not like I can do anything about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly . Instead , we should have some drinks tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about a cold bottle of beer .
segments.speaker: S2
